compatibility.notes: The XPP license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without restrictions. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Include the copyright notice and license text in all redistributions.
Provide acknowledgment of the Indiana University Extreme! Lab in documentation or software.
Do not use the names of Indiana University or Indiana University Extreme! Lab for promotion without permission.
license.name: xpp
obligations: Retain copyright notice, list of authors, conditions, and disclaimer in redistributions of source code.
Reproduce copyright notice, conditions, and disclaimer in documentation for binary redistributions.
Include acknowledgment of software developed by Indiana University Extreme! Lab in documentation or software.
Obtain prior written permission to use the names 'Indiana University' and 'Indiana University Extreme! Lab' for endorsement or promotion.
Obtain prior written permission to use 'Indiana University' in product names derived from this software.
